nodes.text: A group of tomb raiders was active on the planet Korriban around the year 3643 BBY. The group clashed with the forces of the reconstituted Sith Empire and was led by an eccentric underworld figure. Eventually, Sergeant Rikel of the Imperial Army issued Imperial Edict 936, although the forces he sent to recover stolen artifacts and eliminate the looters in the Tomb of Ajunta Pall were killed.
However, a Sith Acolyte found the edict in the tomb and was able to defeat a number of the raiders and bring the stolen artifacts to Rikel.
